snippet.title: Lonely Space Trailer
snippet.description:
Lonely space is an old-fashioned sci-fi immersive sim game.
You find yourself awakened from hibernetic sleep in the docking bay of the Cassiopeia space station. All your crew gone long time ago. You have to rescue them and find out what's going on on the station.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2664120/Lonely_Space/
